snippet.title: Super Toy Cars 2 Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Super Toy Cars 2 is a fast paced arcade racing game where you control miniature cars that speed through amazing tracks made of supersized everyday objects. Outrace and crush your opponents. Fight them up and close or use one of the many power-ups scattered throughout the tracks. Race, fight, crash, jump, play with the objects around the track, alone or with friends. Provoke mayhem! Revive that crazy larger than life feeling of playing with toy cars when you were a kid.

Soon available on Steam Early Access
